name: A Fishing Game, Probably
description:
A Fishing Game, Probably - Game for Alberta Game Jam 2022

by Vivian Liang

08/19/2022 - 08/21/2022

Game Jam Theme

Breaking the rules

Game Description

Are you tired of fishing with a fishing rod? Have you been frustrated sitting by the lake for a day without getting any payback? It is time to break the rules. Let's go fishing with items you would never imagine, and show these stupid fishies who is the real boss. 

Note: Due to the time constraints of the game jam, the game is in its demo state, and only 4 complete stages are available. Feel free to let me know what you think about the project so I can make it better! :) 

Game Controls

Mouse move - Player move/Aim

Left click - Start fishing/Shoot

Right click - Stop fishing/Exit shop

Features

- Full mouse support, mobile friendly 

- Attempt to concentrate different game modes in one game 

- Great comfort for all fishing people who come home empty handed 

Engine used

Godot 3.5

Special Thanks

Zeyan Wang for the inspiration
